page.title: 07A Great Day
page.content: In the year 1977 everyone was busy preparing for Queen Elizabeth'S Silver Jubilee.The preparations were started many weeks before the grand celebration.Everywhere was decorated with flags and other things.The grand day finally came and my friends and I were very excited.Later that afternoon all the floats were heading towards the playing field.When we arrived at the playing field the vicar held a church service in order to celebrate the Jubilee.The Celebration started with a play acted out by my drama group.Next came a tea for the Old Age Pensioners.The day went on a treat and everybody was enjoying themselves.That evening a disco was held for the adults.It was one of the happiest village events I can remember.Now every year in July we hold a village fayre.
